entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SourceProductionContext and GeneratorExecutionContext should share a common interface for AddSource() #62439
  • Convert 'Program' to 'Main' with `file partial class Program` #62437
  • New Stack Trace Explorer only works with English stack traces #62436
  • Specifying `file` class as generic constraints crashes the compiler with NRE #62435
  • Improve error recovery for `partial file class` #62434
  • Investigate a niche 'required' scenario where the compiler overrides a property from IL #62426
    Backlog
  • 'required' isn't offered in records #62421
  • When `csharp_prefer_braces = true:error` build doesn't fail as expected. #62418
  • Revise and combine `GetSymbolModifiers` and `DeclarationModifiers.From` implementation #62416
  • 'Extract base class' doesn't work well for records #62415
  • Can Source Generators support dotnet6? #62414
  • Support 'file' modifier in "IDE0036: Order modifiers" analyzer #62407

Closed

  • Switch expression using pattern matching on floating point values reports wrong result for double.Nan #62241
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash with type parameter on type constrained to file-local type #62448
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump the integration test timeouts a bit #62446
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties and items #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Filter trees to only those containing global-usings or attributes prior to analyzing them. #62444
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add link to detailed map of VS and SDK versions #62438
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Run EndToEnd tests in a more isolated/controlled environment #62433
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert "Make more command handlers synchronous (#62086)" #62432
    Area-IDE
  • Suggested simplifications to the incremental generator codebase. #62427
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove dead code from code generation service #62417
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Complete 'file' support for `SyntaxGenerator` #62413
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62409
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Find the right symbol when following type forwards #62406
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Generate SBOM for VS components #62447
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62441
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62443
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62442
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • faster git checkout #62255
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Skip the balanced switch dispatch optimization for patterns on floating-point inputs #62322
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Reuse prior TableEntry values in the increment NodeTable builder if possible. #62320
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Test helpers shouldn't escape quotes by default #62321
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62431
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62408
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62428
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow OmniSharp options to surface through LegacyGlobalOptions #62405
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62394
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62423
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62425
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62424
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Minor refactoring in 'required' handling for override completion #62422
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Port VB introduce parameter tests to new testing library #62419
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62410
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62412
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62411
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1862557 #62399
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62402
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62403
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62400
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62401
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge 'file-local types' to main #62375
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62395
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62398
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62397
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Enable nullable for classes under Rename folder #62453
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62451
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62450
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Apply changes directly to text buffer #62337
    Area-IDE
  • Add array initialization optimization #62392
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • [EnC] Allow renaming methods, properties, events etc. #62364
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • All incremental generator perf work #62159
    Area-Compilers
  • Exclude BCL libraries from Roslyn vsix #62119
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the data-flow path for searching for attributes to prevent fewer intermediary tables. #62389
    Area-Compilers
  • Give a specific message when analyzer references a more-recent compiler version #61261
    Area-Compilers
  • Make sure options in Tools → Options are persisted #62357
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Verify diagnostics in parsing tests #62341
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove LangVer check from extended nameof binding #62339
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, 17.4
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch to a callback for cleaning up resources instead of passing in an explicit IDisposable. #62373
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic to ensure error list de-duping f… #62237
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Remove expensive and unneeded syntax tree verification #62382
    Area-Compilers
  • Shadow Copy all analyzer dependencies #61974
    Area-Analyzers
  • Record added node output states as new #61575
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handle diff3 conflict markers #62391
    Area-Compilers
  • Increase timeout for unix single machine job #62393
    Area-Infrastructure
